item.content:encoded:
Magic Farm

About  —  Interactive Workshop

Paint your face of Life and Death! —

With delicacy and much skill! How sugar skull? Yes! That’s what this Mexican tradition is all about.

Get your tickets

About The Event

One time a year, our departed come back to celebrate with us

Acerca de  —  Talleres Interactivos

Pinta tu cara de Vida & Muerte

Paint your face of Life and Death! —

Pinta tu cara de Vida & Muerte
